title: Network Rack Overhaul
description: Redesigned and organized network cabling for 50+ racks, improving airflow and reducing troubleshooting time by 30%.

title: Automated Asset Tracking
description: Implemented a barcode-based system to track IT assets across the warehouse, reducing equipment loss by 15%.

title: Deployment Pipeline
description: Created a streamlined process for imaging and configuring 500+ end-user devices using MECM/SCCM.

title: IT Knowledge Base
description: Developed a centralized documentation repository for common IT issues, reducing ticket resolution time for Tier 1 support.
